The scheme should be just a little bit to the feminine side but not overly girly. I think that my business is well represented with purple, blue and green - three colors that are not easy to match without creating a visual mess. I want to project harmony and congruence.I don't need a logo or any other visuals. Just a 3-6 color codes (although an image would be nice, of course, but I just need to see the colors as blocks - just any artist work).If you can also create a nice logo or even additional visuals I'm willing to discuss further options and a price for that, of course. However, to begin with I just need the colors.My business is within personal development and I want to project warmth, acceptance and calmness - but we're not in yoga or mindfullness, it's more a practical psychology for communication, flourishing and professional effectiveness.

desc: This project is quite simple, if you are experienced.I have an online store, a developing brand.Apply your bid and message me to ask for the doc.I will give you a doc which is a list of pictures of Hats, Scarfs, and Mittens. (Specifically)And you will be awarded if you show sample of pictures (perhaps from catalogs...)- Note, pictures must be organized, with material + price + origin stated in a document.This will be proving you have contact with a manufacturer that has what I want and are willing to work with me.If the pictures are similar and relevant to the sample document I give you, I will award you the project.Once you are awarded, there will be 2 days, in that time you will introduce detail of the manufacturer to me and place order for samples, then initial milestone is released.Further, if we like the samples and they are what you said they are, you will be paid the second milestone.Then the final milestone is released when you provide us all docs and info and also take care of first round of orders of the selected products.- Please note that I have done this with multiple various sourcing agents. Only one of them turned out to be legit on this website. Lets not waste each other's time if you dont think you can easily finish this project.I really look forward to establish a long-term business relationship with the best sourcing agent here!Thank you for reading this! :) I may have come off a bit harsh and serious but its to filter out trolls. Once you work with me and show results you will love to work with me again.To Recap the awarding & milestone release process:- To get awarded: give me the document proving you can get me samples that I want. (If you just give me pictures from google instead of pictures from the manufacturer I will report you for scamming me)- First Milestone released after: Gives the contact + catalog + reference + source + all for the manufacturers showed off before getting awarded.- Second Milestone released after: Order & Send samples to me, I confirm samples are what I wanted. (Will pay for the samples via PayPal or Skrill or just additional milestone here) Time is of essence, if you dont come online or answer late, or keep postponing, I will have cancel everything after 2 days and make an honest review.- Third & Last Milestone (most of the award) released after: Taking care of placing and establishing contact with the manufacturer for making this process a thing and repeating for mass orders and customization. So basically all logistics.
title: Find Manufacturer for High Quality & Warm Winter Wear (Accessories)
